# Downtown Clawson DDA

> Downtown Clawson Development Authority (DDA) official website. Independent shops, restaurants, and events along Main Street and 14 Mile Road in Clawson, Michigan. Little City, Big Heart.

- [Saturday Clawson Market](https://downtownclawson.com/saturday-clawson-market.html): 2026 market dates and vendor info.
- [About DDA](https://downtownclawson.com/about-dda.html): Mission, board, strategic plan.
- [Contact](https://downtownclawson.com/contact.html): Phone, email, map.
